description: Mock reflog for first push of a new branch in an existing repository
scenario: AC-5: First push to a NEW branch in an existing repo (branch has no prior push)
reflog_output:
abc1234 HEAD@{0}: commit: feat: implement component
def5678 HEAD@{1}: commit: feat: add component skeleton
111aaa HEAD@{2}: checkout: moving from main to feature/new-component
222bbb HEAD@{3}: push: origin/main

expected_behavior.strategy: First push for this branch - use branch point or HEAD~10
expected_behavior.note: No prior push exists for feature/new-component, but main has push history

branch_point_detection.alternative: Use HEAD~10 if branch point detection fails
